授業目的: The purpose of this course is to introduce students to the Reading and Writing sections of the TOEFL exam and to give guidance and practice in understanding and answering the test questions. In order to register for this course, students must meet minimum level requirements as set by the Language Center.
到達目標:
Students will be able to grasp main ideas from reading and writing samples.
Students will be able to recognize the various types of question used in the test
Students will be able to use vocabulary relevant to the test
Students will be able to target an approximate TOEFL ITP score of 500 or higher and TOEFL IBT score of 61 or higher.
特記事項: この授業を履修するには、事前にレベル認定の申請が必要です。詳細は備考欄を確認してください。
